DOC.detailed_description: Background : Illness Management Recovery ( IMR ) curriculum-based psychosocial intervention design structured program recovery-oriented approach . The aim IMR rehabilitate people severe mental illness help acquire knowledge skill manage illness achieve personal recovery goal . Previous randomise clinical trial indicate IMR implement good effect high fidelity though trial crucial demonstrate potential effectiveness IMR . Methods/Design : The trial design randomise , assessor-blinded , multi-centre , clinical trial IMR program compare treatment usual 200 participant diagnose schizophrenia bipolar disorder care two community mental health centre Capital Region Denmark . The primary outcome level function end treatment follow-up 21 month baseline . The secondary outcome disease symptom ; use alcohol/drugs ; individual meaning recovery ; hope ; hospital admission out-patient psychiatric treatment end treatment follow-up 21 month baseline .
